name: TRANSITION (InvaderKazz)
description:
WHAT IS TRANSITION?

Trantsition is a top down shooter boss fight with somewhat an open ended approach. While your tools are the same, how you use them will depend on you. 

Will you destroy Commandos Captain teleporter system before dealing with him, or are you going directly for the kill? This will change your final encounter before victory.

Can you defeat the  Commando Captain? 

Expected gameplay time: 10 - 20 min.

BUGS OR OTHER ISSUES?

Leave a comment or send an e-mail at "invasor.kazz@gmail.com".
